contents:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. See, Commonwealth v. Johnson, 428 Pa. 210, 236 A. 2d 805 (1968); Commonwealth v. McBride, 440 Pa. 81, 269 A. 2d 737 (1970); Commonwealth ex rel. Washington v. Maroney, 427 Pa. 599, 235 A. 2d 349 (1967).
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
